title: Luke Hall – 2021 Comments on Fairer Parking Charges
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Luke Hall, the Local Government Minister, on 26 May 2021.
content:
This government is making life easier for motorists as we get back to life as usual and build back better from the pandemic.
